entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.6°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
